title: Brand Partnerships Client Account Executive

description:
About the Role:

The job offers an opportunity to join a dynamic and innovative company in Seattle, WA. The compensation package includes a competitive salary and equity, along with standard benefits. The role provides a chance to be part of a team contributing to the success of a groundbreaking initiative.

What You’ll Be Part Of:

The hiring company specializes in offering advanced measurement and attribution solutions for advertising on television and streaming platforms. The company's solutions enable advertisers to assess creative effectiveness, optimize media plans, and attribute advertising results for cross-platform campaigns, all while benchmarking against competitors and historical norms. The role involves working with prospective customers and internal cross-functional teams to effectively sell the company's Media Measurement and Attribution services.

Responsibilities:
• Engage with the strategic installed client base, including prospecting new client opportunities, presenting new use case applications, proposal generation, and sales cycle management
• Identify and drive cross-sell opportunities
• Develop and execute client account plans to achieve/exceed quota
• Position new opportunities/products, run demos, and manage multiple customer sales cycles
• Build strong relationships with key decision makers, influencers, and partners within assigned strategic accounts
• Utilize the sales process to effectively move opportunities through the pipeline
• Manage customer contact activities, tools, and systems, and update relevant information in the systems
• Collaborate effectively across the organization, including Client Data Science, Account Management, Sales Solutions, Marketing, Agency, and the Executive Team
• Extract data and creative insights from the company's platform and generate unique and compelling insights for clients
• Develop strong relationships with key brand contacts to achieve a trusted-advisor status

Qualifications and Education Requirements:
• Bachelor’s degree or equivalent
• 5+ years of consultative B2B sales experience in an agency, research or digital media services firm with a focus on selling subscription-based services to brands
• Advertising measurement/creative assessment experience preferred
• Deep understanding of media planning, media buying, advertising technology, and digital media with an emphasis on linear TV, OTT/Streaming, Addressable
• Proven success working in a fast-paced, high-growth environment
• Exceptional verbal and written communication & presentation skills
• Strong Media Measurement and/or SaaS sales experience

Tools You Will Use:
• CRM Tools: Salesforce, Sales Navigator, and Highspot
• Zoom and Chorus
• Google Suite
• Microsoft Office Suite, with a heavy emphasis on Excel and PowerPoint

Additional Notes:

$140,000-160,000 USD Annually.

Location:

Seattle, WA

Hybrid & Flexible Workplace Policy

The hiring company supports a hybrid and flexible workplace, offering options for full-time or part-time office-based or fully remote employment. The policy allows for flexibility while encouraging consistency.
